title: Pretty printing
description:
Thanks to a patch by Jurjen Bos (with some additions & modifications by me) we now got pretty printing in sympy. To see some examples, running it from isympy (you need sympy from svn):

In [1]: pprint x**2 +x +1
------> pprint(x**2 +x +1)
     2
1+x+x

In …
